name: 透
text: なんか、みんなすごく上手くなってるよね
trans: Recently, I've been getting really good at dancing.

name: 透
text:
──ダンスの話
今週ダンスレッスンしたいんだけど
trans:
About that,
I'd like to take dance lessons this week.

name: 透
text:
あ、いいの？
ふふっ、ありがと

name: 透
text:
あ、うん。わかってたよ
……ごめんね、急に
trans:
Ah, okay. Got it.
Sorry for asking suddenly.
